name: Close_Encounters_of_the_Third_Kind
text:
Close Encounters of the Third Kind
Close Encounters of the Third Kind was a 1977 film directed by Steven Spielberg.
The ending of the film was reportedly inspired by an alleged visit by President Eisenhower to Holloman Air Force Base, where he was said to have met with extraterrestrial beings.
Behind the scenes
Close Encounters of the Third Kind is a 1977 science fiction film written and directed by Steven Spielberg.
